timeline.bodyText: since this is used by library instrumentation also, maybe rename to Version or maybe InstrumentationApiVersion?
timeline.author: trask

replies.bodyText: Version is too generic for me. And I am not sure about Instrumentation*Api*Version. I see it more like implementation version, the id of the specific artifact.
replies.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: I'm good with InstrumentationVersion (just trying to get Agent out of the name)
replies.author: trask
